comments.body:
how do we decide on these levels anymore?
we run kind at 4 in CI I think, so this neatly avoids these, but I think 4 was semi-arbitrary (At best maybe copying kube-up test-config?)
I don't have a very satisfying answer, other than V(5) is the level at which kube-apiserver starts spitting out so much debug info you must not care about log volume
you could also use vmodule to increase verbosity just for this file if you wanted to output these without drowning in other logs
